subject: Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: The Rutgers athletic director who shepherded the university into an era of big-time college sports but whose tenure was also marked by ethics scandals, will resign his position.
snippet: The Rutgers athletic director who shepherded the university into an era of big-time college sports but whose tenure was also marked by ethics scandals, will resign his position.
